- ## #rollbackDueToTechnicalProblems
##rollbackDueToTechnicalProblems #Continuous #Deployment #Operational #Quality #Value #Creation #Value #Drivers #ValueBased #Software #Engineering #Software #Engineering 
For example, continuous-integra- tion builds and tests must be scaled  up for increasing volumes of code  changes, infrastructure requirements  such as virtual machines or li- brary dependencies must be cod- ified using infrastructure-as-code  programming languages, and oper- ators should be able to roll back to  a safe earlier release at the click of  a button.
